pr_title: Fix PR #1155 to avoid breaking change in the sensitivity results constructor

timeline.message:
Fix PR #1155 to avoid breaking change in the sensitivity results constructor

Signed-off-by: Agnès Leroy <agnes.leroy@rte-france.com>

timeline.bodyText:
You can just call the other constructor (prevent code duplication):
this(ok, metrics, logs, sensitivityValues, Collections.emptyMap());
timeline.author: MioRtia
